00023 #ifndef _CTK_SPE_PROGRAM_HPP
00024 #define _CTK_SPE_PROGRAM_HPP
00025 
00026 #include "ctk_common.h"
00027 #include "ctk_spe.h"
00028 #include "ctk_atomic.h"
00029 
00034 namespace ctk {
00035 
00039 class SpeImage {
00040         ctk_spe_program_t *m_program;
00041         ctk_atomic_ea_t m_counter_ea;
00042 
00043         void release() {
00044             if (m_counter_ea != 0) {
00045                 if (_ctk_atomic_dec(m_counter_ea) == 1) {
00046                     // we were the last one
00047                     ::ctk_spe_image_close(m_program);
00048                     _ctk_atomic_destroy_local(m_counter_ea);
00049                 }
00050             }
00051         }
00052 
00053         friend class SpeThread;
00054 
00055         /* default constructor (private) */
00056         SpeImage() : m_program(NULL), m_counter_ea(0) { }
00057 
00058     public:
00060         SpeImage(ctk_spe_program_t &program)
00061             : m_program(&program), m_counter_ea(0) { }
00062 
00067         SpeImage(const char *filename) {
00068             if (filename == NULL)
00069                 throw Error(CTK_ERROR_NULL_OBJECT);
00070             int ret = ::ctk_spe_image_open(&m_program, filename);
00071             if (ret != CTK_SUCCESS)
00072                 throw Error(ret);
00073             _ctk_atomic_create_local(&m_counter_ea);
00074             _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00075         }
00076 
00081         SpeImage(const SpeImage &image)
00082             : m_program(image.m_program), m_counter_ea(image.m_counter_ea)
00083         {
00084             if (m_counter_ea != 0)
00085                 _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00086         }
00087 
00089         SpeImage &operator=(const SpeImage &image) {
00090             if (m_program == image.m_program)
00091                 return *this;
00092             release();
00093 
00094             m_program = image.m_program;
00095             m_counter_ea = image.m_counter_ea;
00096             _ctk_atomic_inc(m_counter_ea);
00097             return *this;
00098         }
00099 
00103         virtual ~SpeImage() {
00104             release();
00105         }
00106 
00108         ctk_spe_program_t *getProgram() const {
00109             return m_program;
00110         }
00111 };
00112 
00113 }; // namespace ctk
00114 
00115 #endif /* _CTK_SPE_PROGRAM_HPP */
